function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High number of participants in close proximity","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Limit the number of participants and maintain physical distance","Technologies":"Video conferencing, telecommuting","People":"Study participants, researchers, staff","Owner":"Research team, organizers"},{"Description":"Photographs and narratives collected from various homes","Impact":"Potential exposure to different living conditions and hygiene standards","Mitigation":"Handle the materials with appropriate safety measures and sanitation protocols","Technologies":"Online surveys, digital data collection","People":"Researchers, data collectors, participants","Owner":"Research team, data collectors"},{"Description":"Large volume of data and photographs","Impact":"Difficulty in managing and analyzing the data effectively","Mitigation":"Use data management software and automation tools for analysis","Technologies":"Data management software, machine learning, automation tools","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"}]}
